sen.j: 妙心寺駅（みょうしんじえき）は、京都市右京区花園天授ケ岡町にある京福電気鉄道京福電気鉄道北野線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Hanazono Tenjugaoka-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Myoshinji Station is a stop on the Kitano Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.
Myoshinji Station, located in Hanazono Tenjugaoka-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Kitano Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.
Myoshinji Station, located in Hanazono Tenjugaoka-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Kitano Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 千鳥式配置の2面1線ホームを持つ地上駅。
sen.e: It is an aboveground station having two bar-like structure platforms which are not set straight in front of each other, and only one side of each platform is used for a single track.
sen.cmt: 「千鳥式配置」は定訳不明のため、下記などを参考に「互い違いになった（配置）」という表記で訳出いたしました。
sen.e: It's an aboveground station having two platforms of bar-like structure, which are slightly offset, and only one side of each platform is used for a single track.
It's an aboveground station having two platforms in staggered array, and only one side of each platform is used for a single track.
sen.cmt: 千鳥式ホーム→platforms in staggered array としました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: Keifuku Myoshinji-ekimae (in front of Myoshinji Station)

sen.j: 10号系統：（河原町駅 (京都府)経由）三条京阪行／宇多野・山越行
sen.e: System 10: For Sanjo-Keihan (via Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture)) and for Utano and Yamagoe
System 10: For Sanjo-Keihan (via Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture)) and for Utano and Yamagoe
System 10: For Sanjo-Keihan (via Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture))/for Utano and Yamagoe
sen.cmt: スラッシュを追加しました。

sen.j: 26号系統：（四条烏丸経由）京都駅行／宇多野・山越行
sen.e: System 26: For Kyoto Station (via Shijo-Karasuma) and for Utano and Yamagoe
System 26: For Kyoto Station (via Shijo-Karasuma) and for Utano and Yamagoe
System 26: For Kyoto Station (via Shijo-Karasuma)/for Utano and Yamagoe
sen.cmt: スラッシュを追加しました。

sen.j: 西日本JRバス「嵐電妙心寺駅前」停留所
sen.e: Randen Myoshinji-ekimae bus stop of West JR Bus Company
The Randen Myoshinji-ekimae bus stop of the West JR Bus Company
The Randen Myoshinji-ekimae bus stop of the West JR Bus Company

sen.j: 1925年（大正14年）11月3日 京都電燈の駅として開業。
sen.e: November 3, 1925: Started as a station operated by Kyoto Dento, an electric power corporation.
November 3, 1925: It started as a station operated by Kyoto Dento, an electric power corporation.
November 3, 1925: It started as a station operated by Kyoto Dento, an electric power company.
sen.cmt: electric power company としました。

sen.j: 1942年（昭和17年）3月2日 路線継承により京福電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: March 2, 1942: It became a station under the control of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., a company succeeded the railway.
March 2, 1942: The station was placed under the control of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., a company that succeeded to the railway.
March 2, 1942: The station was placed under the control of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., a company that succeeded to the railway.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 龍安寺駅 B7 - 妙心寺駅 B6 - 御室仁和寺駅 B5
sen.e: Ryoanji Station B7 - Myoshinji Station B6 - Omuro-Ninnaji Station B5
Ryoanji Station B7 - Myoshinji Station B6 - Omuro-Ninnaji Station B5
Ryoanji Station (B7) - Myoshinji Station (B6) - Omuro-Ninnaji Station (B5)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一し、駅番号に括弧を追加しました。
